body.content:
Dear Sir/Madam,



Good day to you. I hope this email meets you well and you are keeping safe?



I'm writing you as a consultant of a company who is looking for representatives.



Due to the global pandemic affecting businesses and individuals around the globe, they have structured a financial package to help companies and individuals get started again.



They are in direct contact with a group of private investors with huge portfolios, who are prepared, willing and able to provide non-recourse loans for companies or individuals who are able to provide or meet the requirements.



If you are interested, please send us a brief summary of your project for possible approval.



Best Regards.
